document_data.name: Summon Undead II
document_data.mainbody: '''''Summon undead II''''', also known as '''''Undead summoning II''''', was one of the series of ''[[summon undead]]'' spells available to arcane casters in the [[Forgotten Realms|Realms]].
document_data.Effects: This spell could summon a [[heucuva]], [[skeleton]] or [[zombie]], or it could summon one to three medium-sized skeletons or the same number of small zombies, provided they were within {{SI|30|ft}} of each other.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a piece of bone taken from a [[ghast]], [[mummy]] or a [[wight]].
document_data.History: This spell was known to be used by wizards of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
